directions: Place the Italian parsley, olive oil, red wine vinegar, oregano, cumin, salt, garlic, hot sauce, red pepper flakes, and lemon juice in the bowl of a food processor. Pulse until the parsley has been minced.
ingredients: 1 ¾ cups chopped Italian flat-leaf parsley leaves
½ teaspoon hot sauce (such as Tabasco®)
title: Chimichurri Muy Pefecto
